Question: Gerald McBoing-Boing (1950), which was based on an original story by this person, won the Academy Award for Animated Short Film.
Hints: This person, he also authored over a dozen books as Theo LeSieg and one as Rosetta Stone.
This person has a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame, at the 6500 block of Hollywood Boulevard.
The July 16, 1927, issue of the The Saturday Evening Post published his first cartoon under the name this person.
